frontmatter.title: IconButtonToggle
frontmatter.notes: Helps toggle Data view between list, card view etc.

props.name: activeValue
props.docblock: value to use to check which button to set to active

description.text: value to use to check which button to set to active

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: handler that is passed the currently active button's value when a button is selected

description.text: handler that is passed the currently active button's value when a button is selected

props.name: children
props.docblock: child nodes of type `IconButton` (or its subcomponents) to be rendered within toggle group

description.text: child nodes of type `IconButton` (or its subcomponents) to be rendered within toggle group
